caption.center: ROYNES JOSEPH "ERIC" DURAL II, Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant v. STATE

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (SPP NO. 06-1-0037; CR. NO. 02-1-2791)
opinion.attorneys: Virginia E. Hench (The Hawai'i Innocence Project), on the application for petitioner/petitioner-appellant.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: ACOBA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ., and Circuit Judge Hifo, assigned by reason of vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: (The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on December 12, 2008 by Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant Roynes Joseph "Eric" Dural II is hereby rejected, without prejudice to filing another Rule 40 petition in the circuit court based on alleged website statements of Shyla Combis and the declarations of Chad Kalawaia and Vibiana Slutter, referred to in the Application.
